summary: Dragonborn Shout should be a power that both human and dragon should fear. Only for those who really want have some deadly verbal debate with dragons.
descriptionHtml:
Dragonborn Shout should be a power that both human and dragon should fear. Only for those who really want have some deadly verbal debate with dragons. This mod make Dragonborn shouts to be much powerfull and intended to use in Master difficulty (and of course with either Mighty Dragons or Hardcore Deadly Dragons).

Changelog : click the link on latest version number above.

The complete shout improvment description on latest version are:

Unrelenting Force:
- Cooldown cut just using 3 sec for 1st word, 6 sec for 2nd word, 9 sec for 3rd word.

Fire Breath:
- Cooldown cut just using 3 sec for 1st word, 5 sec for 2nd word, 10 sec for 3rd word.
- Greatly increase damage to 300 points for 1st word, 600 points for 2nd word, 900 points for 3rd word. 
- Add Wall of Fire trailing effect for 3rd word with 50 points damage for 5 sec.

Frost Breath:
- Cooldown cut just using 3 sec for 1st word, 5 sec for 2nd word, 10 sec for 3rd word.
- Greatly increase damage to 60 points for 5 sec (total 300 points) for 1st word, 120 points for 5 sec (total 600 points) for 2nd word, 180 points for 5 sec (total 900 points) for 3rd word.
- Add Wall of Frost trailing effect for 3rd word with 50 points damage for 5 sec.

Aura Whisper:
- Cooldown cut just using 3 sec for 1st word, 4 sec for 2nd word, 5 sec for 3rd word.
- Aura Whisper now have differnt colors for hostile and non-hostile for both living and undead.

Become Ethereal:
- Cooldown cut just using 10 sec for 1st word, 15 sec for 2nd word, 20 sec for 3rd word.
- Have muffling effect.

Call Dragon:
- Cooldown cut just using 150 sec for 3rd word.

Call Valor:
- Cooldown cut just using 18 sec for all word.
- Hakor One-eye are stronger. Hopefully be strong enough to survive a bite or two from Aspect of Alduin :D

Clear Skies:
- Cooldown cut just using 3 sec for 1st word, 5 sec for 2nd word, 8 sec for 3rd word.

Disarm:
- Cooldown cut just using 3 sec for 1st word, 3 sec for 2nd word, 4 sec for 3rd word.
- Double the magnitude of each word.
- 3rd word could affect up to lv 99 enemies.
- Disarm now effective against mages, deal magicka damage 100 points for 1st word, 200 points for 2nd word, 300 points for 3rd word.

Dismay:
- Cooldown cut just using 4 sec for 1st word, 4 sec for 2nd word, 5 sec for 3rd word.
- Double the magnitude of each word.
- 3rd word Dismay have 20% chance to Paralyze anything except dragons for 5 sec.
- 3rd word of Dismay could affect enemies up to lvl 99, also affect undead, automatons, and daedra.

Elemental Fury:
- Cooldown cut just using 20 sec for all word.
- Increase weapon speed 1.5x for 1st word, 2x for 2nd word, 2.5x for 3rd word.
- Elemental Fury now suppot bow.

Ice Form:
- Cooldown cut just using 6 sec for 1st word, 9 sec for 2nd word, 12 sec for 3rd word.
- Add Wall of Frost trailing effect for 3rd word with 50 points damage for 5 sec.

Kyne Peace:
- Cooldown cut just using 4 sec for 1st word, 5 sec for 2nd word, 6 sec for 3rd word.
- Double the magnitude of each word.
- 3rd word of Kyne Peace could effetc animals up to lvl 99
- Kyne Peace could affect Animals and Human, but not Daedra, undead, dwarven mech, and dragons.

Animal Allegiance:
- Cooldown cut just using 5 sec for 1st word, 6 sec for 2nd word, 7 sec for 3rd word.
- Affect stronger animals.
- 3rd word of Animal Allegiance could affect animals up to lvl 99

Marked for Death:
- Cooldown cut just using 5 sec for 1st word, 10 sec for 2nd word, 15 sec for 3rd word.
- Increase health damage to 5 points (total 300 points) for 1st word, 10 points (total 600 points) for 2nd word, 15 points (total 900 points) for 3rd word.
- Decrease target armor rating by 100 points for 1st word, 200 points for 2nd word, 300 points for 3rd word.
- Decrease target magic resistance by 10% for 1st word, 20% for 2nd word, 30% for 3rd word. Usefull for mage characters.
- Fix permanent armor decrease bug.

Slow Time:
- Cooldown cut just using 11 sec for 1st word, 16 sec for 2nd word, 40 sec for 3rd word.
- Increase duration to 10 sec for 1st word, 15 sec for 2nd word, 20 sec for 3rd word.
- 3rd word Slow Time are much stronger on slowing time.

Whirlwind Sprint:
- Cooldown cut just using 2 sec for 1st word, 3 sec for 2nd word, 4 sec for 3rd word.

Storm Call:
- Cooldown cut just using 100 sec for 1st word, 160 sec for 2nd word, 200 sec for 3rd word.
- Greatly increase each bolt damage to 200 points for 1st word, 300 points for 2nd word, 500 points for 3rd word.
- Add Wall of Storm effect on impact with 20 damage for 1st word, 30 points for 2nd word, 50 points for 3rd word.

Word of Power Meditation from Paathrunax will give additional power to related shout:
+ Fus : Unrelenting Force do additional 50 points damage for 1st word, 100 points for 2nd word, and 200 points for 3rd word. Give stronger stagger and anti-stagger (50% instead of 25%). Since version 1.3.1, meditating Fus word will make you invulnerable to strong Unrelenting Force shout :D
+ Feim : Increase health, stamina, and magicka regeneration by 50%.
+ Yol : Reduce incoming Fire based damage by 25%.

Improvement in new Shouts in Dawnguard DLC.

Summon Durnehviir:
- Change 3rd word cool down to 150 sec.

Drain Vitality:
- Change cool down to 3 sec for 1st word, 6 sec for 2nd word, 9 sec for 3rd word.
- Drain Vitality shout now will drain health, stamina, and magicka since the first word. The damage will increase with each word.
- Drain Vitality shout will have only 5 sec duration but with much greater damage to be much usefull in most combat. 60 dmg per sec for 5 in 1st word, 120 dmg in 2nd word, and 180 in 3rd word.

Soul Tear:
- Change Soul Tear shout 3rd word cool down to 18 sec.
- 3rd word of Soul Tear shout now do 900 dmg and it\'s ignore resistance.

Planned future update:
+ Fixing bug that Call for Valor summon got absorbed if player have alteration Atronach perk  or Atronach standing stone power.
+ Optional patch to remove blue screen effects of Become Ethereal and Slow Time shout.

Special thanks to SeanenG for bug fix of Marked for Death shout.

Recommended mods:
- Storm Call by DrMiller (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27470), this is a nice fix to make storm call bolts only hits actors that hostile to player. But with that said, don\'t ever try to shout storm call in the middle of any city :D

Critics and suggestion for improvement are welcome :)

My other mods:
- Flesh Spell Fortify Unarmed Damage (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14361)
- Magic Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14825)
- Assasin Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14929)
- Daedric Artifacts Overlord (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15667)
- Craftable Scythes (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17821)
author: BtyoP

files.changelogHtml:
3rd word of Dismay could affect enemies up to lvl 99, also affect undead, automatons, and daedra.
3rd word of Animal Allegiance could affect animals up to lvl 99
3rd word of Kyne Peace could effetc animals up to lvl 99
Kyne Peace could affect Animals and Human, but not Daedra, undead, dwarven mech, and dragons.
Add Dawnguard shouts

Fus word mediation will make you invulnerable to Unrelenting Force shout
